statements: DELETE FROM smart_meter_readings WHERE meter_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-09-30';
DELETE FROM smart_grid_devices WHERE device_name = 'Meter1' AND status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM smart_grid_devices WHERE status = FALSE AND location = 'Building A';
DELETE FROM smart_grid_security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access' AND event_date <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM smart_grid_role_permissions WHERE role_id = 1 AND permission_id = 2;
DELETE FROM smart_grid_role_permissions WHERE permission_id = 3 AND role_id = 2;
DELETE FROM smart_grid_user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 3;
